title: Mark Account's Open Opportunities as Closed Won
overview: A #Data List is configured to display Open Opportunities as an Account’s related list using a dynamic filter, with Pre-Action: Edit Fields specified. When users click the “Close Won” action button for selected records, a modal opens with target field values derived from the Executable’s field mappings, allowing them to review and adjust these values before executing the action.
generalUseCase: Use actionable #Data List with dynamic filters to display related data for the current record on a Lightning Record Page. Users can select records to run processes defined by Executables and, if enabled, review or edit transformed values before the action is applied.
